title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.113 - Drainboards
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.113 - Drainboards

State Regulations

Drainboards of adequate size are to be provided and used for the proper handling of solid items prior to washing and of clean items following sanitization. Drainboards are to be self-draining and to be located and constructed so that they do not interfere with the proper use of the dishwashing facilities. Use of easily movable tables for the storage of clean items following sanitization is allowed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
